ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Film and Video Productions, 2014)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (FILM AND VIDEO PRODUCTIONS, 2014) in order to simplify and clarify the rules regarding the types of investors allowed for the purposes of the Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit.
